overview: The USA is attacked by a large group of well organized terrorists who communicate through a computer network via satellite. A bunch of highschool kids has hacked the password and gained access. Believing it's a game they unknowingly cause terror acts all over the country. An anti-terror force fights against the terrorists.
tagline: This weekend they're programmed to party. But, the game they're playing is programmed to kill.
title: Terminal Entry
